title: Live blog Novak Djokovic downs Dominic Thiem for eighth Australian Open crown
text:
Stephanie Brantz and Jason Goodall preview the men's final between Novak Djokovic and Dominic Thiem. (2:16)

Will Djokovic win again in the men's final? (2:16)

The king of Melbourne, Novak Djokovic has won his eighth Australian Open title, downing Austria's Dominic Thiem in five sets, 6-4, 4-6, 2-6, 6-3, 6-4.

Catch up on how he did it below.

NB: If the blog doesn't load on the first go, refresh the page and it should be fine!
